articles.author: Mike Wall
articles.title: European Vega C rocket launches CO2-mapping satellite, 4 Earth-observation spacecraft to orbit - Space
articles.description: Liftoff occurred at 10:03 p.m. ET tonight (July 25).
articles.content:
A carbon dioxide-mapping satellite and four Earth-observation spacecraft launched successfully tonight (July 25) from South America.
A Vega C rocket, operated by the French company Arianespace, lift… [+2604 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: E.U. regulator approves injectable HIV drug that experts say could help stop transmission - NBC News
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency has recommended authorizing a twice-yearly injectable drug aimed at preventing HIV, which scientists say could help end transmission.
articles.content:
LONDON The European Medicines Agency has recommended authorizing a twice-yearly injectable drug aimed at preventing HIV, which scientists say could help end the virus transmission.
In a statement on… [+2221 chars]

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold 7 is a hit in Europe, Blue Shadow shines worldwide - SamMobile
articles.description: Recently, the European Union introduced a rule that brands should offer a label for their phones that shows their energy efficiency, battery life and longevity, durability against drops, IP rating for water and dust resistance, and repairability scores. Well,…
articles.content: While announcing the global launch of the Galaxy Z Fold 7, Flip 7/7FE, and Watch 8 earlier today, Samsung snuck in an exciting detail regarding early pre-order numbers. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 in Europe … [+1962 chars]
